quote: It is transparent, that’s why we set up the FISA court.
quotePlain: It is transparent, that’s why we set up the FISA court.
name: Barack Obama

checks.quote: We don’t doubt that there are good reasons for secrecy at the court, but if you’re going to operate a mostly secret court, you also don’t get to crow about how "transparent" it is. The president can’t have his cake and eat it, too.
checks.quotePlain: We don’t doubt that there are good reasons for secrecy at the court, but if you’re going to operate a mostly secret court, you also don’t get to crow about how “transparent” it is. The president can’t have his cake and eat it, too.

claims.title: the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court is transparent
claims.negative: the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court is not transparent
claims.negativePlain: the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Court is not transparent
claims.truth: Almost everything the FISA court does is classified, and extremely opaque.
claims.truthPlain: Almost everything the FISA court does is classified, and extremely opaque.
